docs.lead_paragraph: On Tuesday and Wednesday, The Lede provided updates in real time on the final stage of the rescue of 33 Chilean miners whose entrapment in a collapsed mine shaft ended after 69 days. The live coverage included a video feed from the mine (now concluded) and reports from our colleagues Simon Romero and Alexei Barrionuevo, who were at the San José mine, near the Chilean city of Copiapó, along with family members of the miners and more than 1,400 journalists. To follow the rescue as it unfolded, read up the page below.

headline.main: Latest Updates on the Rescue of the Chilean Miners

docs.abstract: The Lede provided updates on the rescue of 33 Chilean miners whose entrapment in a collapsed mine shaft ended after 69 days.
docs.snippet: The Lede provided updates on the rescue of 33 Chilean miners whose entrapment in a collapsed mine shaft ended after 69 days.

byline.original: By ROBERT MACKEY, CATRIN EINHORN and M. AMEDEO TUMOLILLO

docs.lead_paragraph: Research on testosterone therapy for aging men is under way, but there has yet to be a comprehensive study of the treatment.

headline.seo: Testosterone Hormone Replacement for Men? Perhaps
